vclaim: On Oct. 17, Women's March protesters in Washington D.C. assaulted Isabella DeLuca for carrying a Trump 2020 flag.
title: Did Women’s March Protesters Assault a Woman for Carrying Trump 2020 Flag?
subtitle: Activist Isabella DeLuca claimed she was "punched in the face and choked by two women" simply for carrying a Trump 2020 flag.
author: Dan MacGuill
